channel.title: Help with commands
channel.description:
i need to no owner commands
like how to ip ban some 1 right away and and ban them for a pirod of time. and some with mute and i want to no more commands

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler bifocaler
item.description:
@bifocaler wrote:

[quote=“buckybkatt, post:4, topic:344146”]Umm ok… Well if your server has them they are probably

::mute [playername] – mutes that player
::unmute [playername] – unmutes that player
::ban [playername] OR ::banuser [playername] – bans that player
::kick [playername] – kicks that player
::ipban [playername] – ipbans that player
::ipmute [playername] – ipmutes that player

Make sure you have these commands by searching for “mute” or “ban” in your client.java file (assuming your using a 317)[/quote]yes im 317 ty some much

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @buckybkatt buckybkatt
item.description:
@buckybkatt wrote:

Umm ok… Well if your server has them they are probably

::mute [playername] – mutes that player
::unmute [playername] – unmutes that player
::ban [playername] OR ::banuser [playername] – bans that player
::kick [playername] – kicks that player
::ipban [playername] – ipbans that player
::ipmute [playername] – ipmutes that player

Make sure you have these commands by searching for “mute” or “ban” in your client.java file (assuming your using a 317)

Read full topic
